name: Hall-O-Quest
description:
Halloween themed game made on Game Maker Studio.

Help Wolfie in Halloween night fill the Candy-O-Meter. You have all the neighborhood to explore, freely knock on any door you want and test your luck!

If the neighbor is nice, you'll unlock a card matching game (that changes every time!) with creepy pumpkins. Finish it to fill in the Candy-O-Meter and to earn extra seconds!

However, if the neighbor isn't nice, you'll have to dodge a shower of eggs! They'll gradually empty the Candy-O-Meter so watch out for that!
